member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark

summary.vsli:raw: Represents a placeholder (bookmark) within an event stream. You can use the placeholder to mark a position and return to this position in a stream of events. An instance of this object can be obtained from an <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord" /> object, in which case it corresponds to the position of that event record.

member.summary: 表示事件資料流中的預留位置 (書籤)。 您可以使用預留位置 (Placeholder) 來標記位置 (Position)，並返回事件資料流中的這個位置 (Position)。 這個物件的執行個體可以從 物件取得，在這種情況下，它會對應至該事件記錄的位置。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogIsolation

summary.vsli:raw: Defines the default access permissions for the event log. The Application and System values indicate that the log shares the access control list (ACL) with the appropriate Windows log (the Application or System event logs) and share the Event Tracing for Windows (ETW) session with other logs of the same isolation. All channels with Custom isolation use a private ETW session.

member.summary: 定義事件記錄檔的預設存取權限。 Application 和 System 值表示記錄檔會與適當的 Windows 記錄檔 (應用程式或系統事件記錄檔) 共用存取控制清單 (ACL)，並與相同隔離的其他記錄檔共用 Windows 事件追蹤 (ETW) 工作階段。 所有具有自訂隔離的通道都會使用私用 ETW 工作階段。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogIsolation.Application

summary.vsli:raw: The log shares the access control list with the Application event log and shares the ETW session with other logs that have Application isolation.

member.summary: 記錄檔會與應用程式事件記錄檔共用存取控制清單，並與具有應用程式隔離的其他記錄檔共用 ETW 工作階段。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogIsolation.Custom

summary.vsli:raw: The event log is a custom event log that uses its own private ETW session.

member.summary: 事件記錄檔是使用自身私用 ETW 工作階段的自訂事件記錄檔。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogIsolation.System

summary.vsli:raw: The log shares the access control list with the System event log and shares the ETW session with other logs that have System isolation.

member.summary: 記錄檔會與系統事件記錄檔共用存取控制清單，並與具有系統隔離的其他記錄檔共用 ETW 工作階段。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogLink

summary.vsli:raw: Represents a link between an event provider and an event log that the provider publishes events into. This object cannot be instantiated.

member.summary: 表示事件提供者與提供者發行事件的目標事件記錄檔之間的連結。 無法執行個體化這個物件。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogLink.DisplayName

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the localized name of the event log.

member.summary: 取得事件記錄檔的當地語系化名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the localized name of the event log.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含事件記錄檔的當地語系化名稱。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogLink.IsImported

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a Boolean value that determines whether the event log is imported, rather than defined in the event provider. An imported event log is defined in a different provider.

member.summary: 取得布林值，這個值可判斷事件記錄檔是否已匯入，而不是在此事件提供者中定義。 匯入的事件記錄檔是在不同提供者中定義。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the event log is imported by the event provider, and returns <see langword="false" /> if the event log is not imported by the event provider.

member.returns: 如果事件記錄檔是由事件提供者匯入，則傳回 ，如果事件記錄檔不是由事件提供者匯入，則傳回 。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogLink.LogName

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the non-localized name of the event log associated with this object.

member.summary: 取得與這個物件相關聯之非當地語系化的事件記錄檔名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the non-localized name of the event log associated with this object.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含與這個物件相關聯之非當地語系化的事件記錄檔名稱。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogMode

summary.vsli:raw: Determines the behavior for the event log service handles an event log when the log reaches its maximum allowed size (when the event log is full).

member.summary: 當事件記錄到達允許的大小上限 (事件記錄已滿) 時，判斷事件記錄服務處理事件記錄的行為。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogMode.AutoBackup

summary.vsli:raw: Archive the log when full, do not overwrite events. The log is automatically archived when necessary. No events are overwritten.

member.summary: 封存已滿的記錄，不覆寫事件。 必要時記錄會自動封存。 不會覆寫任何事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogMode.Circular

summary.vsli:raw: New events continue to be stored when the log file is full. Each new incoming event replaces the oldest event in the log.

member.summary: 當記錄檔已滿時，會繼續儲存新事件。 每個內送的新事件都會取代記錄中最舊的事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogMode.Retain

summary.vsli:raw: Do not overwrite events. Clear the log manually rather than automatically.

member.summary: 不覆寫事件。 手動清除記錄，而非自動清除。

summary.vsli:raw: Represents a query for events in an event log and the settings that define how the query is executed and on what computer the query is executed on.

member.summary: 表示事件記錄檔中事件的查詢，以及定義如何執行查詢和執行查詢所在電腦的設定。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery.#ctor(System.String,System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.PathType)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery" /> class by specifying the target of the query. The target can be an active event log or a log file.

param.vsli:raw: The name of the event log to query, or the path to the event log file to query.

member.param: 要查詢之事件記錄的名稱，或是要查詢之事件記錄檔的路徑。

param.name: pathType
param.vsli:raw: Specifies whether the string used in the path parameter specifies the name of an event log, or the path to an event log file.

member.param: 指定用於路徑參數的字串是否會指定事件記錄名稱或事件記錄檔路徑。

param.name: path
param.vsli:raw: The name of the event log to query, or the path to the event log file to query.

param.vsli:raw: The event query used to retrieve events that match the query conditions.

member.param: 事件查詢，用來擷取符合查詢條件的事件。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery.ReverseDirection

summary.vsli:raw: Gets or sets the Boolean value that determines whether to read events from the newest event in an event log to the oldest event in the log.

member.summary: 取得或設定布林值，這個值可判斷讀取事件時，順序是否從事件記錄檔中的最新事件到最舊事件。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns <see langword="true" /> if events are read from the newest event in the log to the oldest event, and returns <see langword="false" /> if events are read from the oldest event in the log to the newest event.

member.returns: 如果從記錄檔中的最新事件到最舊事件來讀取事件，則傳回 ，如果從記錄檔中的最舊事件到最新事件來讀取事件，則傳回 。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery.Session

summary.vsli:raw: Gets or sets the session that access the Event Log service on the local computer or a remote computer. This object can be set to access a remote event log by creating a <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader" /> object or an <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher" /> object with this <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery" /> object.

member.summary: 取得或設定存取本機電腦或遠端電腦之事件記錄服務的工作階段。 藉由搭配這個 物件建立 物件或 物件，可設定這個物件來存取遠端事件記錄檔。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogSession" /> object.

member.returns: 傳回 物件。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery.TolerateQueryErrors

summary.vsli:raw: Gets or sets a Boolean value that determines whether this query will continue to retrieve events when the query has an error.

member.summary: 取得或設定布林值，這個值可判斷當查詢有錯誤時，是否會繼續擷取事件。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> indicates that the query will continue to retrieve events even if the query fails for some logs, and <see langword="false" /> indicates that this query will not continue to retrieve events when the query fails.

member.returns: 表示即使某些記錄檔查詢失敗，查詢仍會繼續擷取事件， 表示查詢失敗時，這個查詢不會繼續擷取事件。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader

summary.vsli:raw: Enables you to read events from an event log based on an event query. The events that are read by this object are returned as <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord" /> objects.

member.summary: 可讓您根據事件查詢來讀取事件記錄檔的事件。 這個物件所讀取的事件會當做 物件傳回。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader" /> class by specifying an event query.

member.summary: 藉由指定事件查詢，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

param.name: eventQuery
param.vsli:raw: The event query used to retrieve events.

member.param: 用來擷取事件的事件查詢。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery,System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader" /> class by specifying an event query and a bookmark that is used as starting position for the query.

member.summary: 藉由指定事件查詢以及做為查詢開始位置的書籤，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

param.name: eventQuery
param.vsli:raw: The event query used to retrieve events.

member.param: 用來擷取事件的事件查詢。

param.name: bookmark
param.vsli:raw: The bookmark (placeholder) used as a starting position in the event log or stream of events. Only events logged after the bookmark event will be returned by the query.

member.param: 當做事件記錄檔或事件資料流中開始位置來使用的書籤 (預留位置)。 查詢只會傳回在書籤事件之後所記錄的事件。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader.#ctor(System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader" /> class by specifying an active event log to retrieve events from.

member.summary: 藉由指定從中擷取事件的使用中事件記錄檔，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

param.name: path
param.vsli:raw: The name of the event log to retrieve events from.

member.param: 要從中擷取事件的事件記錄檔名稱。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader.#ctor(System.String,System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.PathType)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader" /> class by specifying the name of an event log to retrieve events from or the path to a log file to retrieve events from.

member.summary: 藉由指定從中擷取事件的事件記錄檔名稱或路徑，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

param.name: path
param.vsli:raw: The name of the event log to retrieve events from, or the path to the event log file to retrieve events from.

member.param: 從中擷取事件的事件記錄檔名稱或路徑。

param.name: pathType
param.vsli:raw: Specifies whether the string used in the path parameter specifies the name of an event log, or the path to an event log file.

member.param: 指定用於路徑參數的字串是否會指定事件記錄名稱或事件記錄檔路徑。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader.CancelReading

summary.vsli:raw: Cancels the current query operation.

member.summary: 取消目前的查詢作業。

summary.vsli:raw: Releases all the resources used by this object.

member.summary: 釋放這個物件所使用的所有資源。

summary.vsli:raw: Releases the unmanaged resources used by this object, and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.summary: 釋放這個物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

param.name: disposing
param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.

member.param: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader.ReadEvent

summary.vsli:raw: Reads the next event that is returned from the event query in this object.

member.summary: 讀取從此物件之事件查詢傳回的下一個事件。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord" /> object.

member.returns: 傳回 物件。

summary.vsli:raw: Reads the next event that is returned from the event query in this object.

member.summary: 讀取從此物件之事件查詢傳回的下一個事件。

param.name: timeout
param.vsli:raw: The maximum time to allow the read operation to run before canceling the operation.

member.param: 取消作業之前，允許讀取作業執行的時間上限。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord" /> object.

member.returns: 傳回 物件。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader.Seek(System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark)

summary.vsli:raw: Changes the position in the event stream where the next event that is read will come from by specifying a bookmark event. No events logged before the bookmark event will be retrieved.

member.summary: 藉由指定書籤事件，變更事件資料流中所讀取之下一個事件的來源位置。 在書籤事件之前所記錄的事件不會遭擷取。

param.name: bookmark
param.vsli:raw: The bookmark (placeholder) used as a starting position in the event log or stream of events. Only events that have been logged after the bookmark event will be returned by the query.

member.param: 當做事件記錄檔或事件資料流中開始位置來使用的書籤 (預留位置)。 查詢只會傳回在書籤事件之後所記錄的事件。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader.Seek(System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark,System.Int64)

summary.vsli:raw: Changes the position in the event stream where the next event that is read will come from by specifying a bookmark event and an offset number of events from the bookmark. No events logged before the bookmark plus the offset will be retrieved.

member.summary: 藉由指定書籤事件和從書籤的事件位移數目，變更事件資料流中所讀取之下一個事件的來源位置。 在書籤加上位移之前所記錄的事件不會遭擷取。

param.name: bookmark
param.vsli:raw: The bookmark (placeholder) used as a starting position in the event log or stream of events. Only events that have been logged after the bookmark event will be returned by the query.

member.param: 當做事件記錄檔或事件資料流中開始位置來使用的書籤 (預留位置)。 查詢只會傳回在書籤事件之後所記錄的事件。

param.name: offset
param.vsli:raw: The offset number of events to change the position of the bookmark.

member.param: 要變更書籤位置的事件位移數目。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader.Seek(System.IO.SeekOrigin,System.Int64)

summary.vsli:raw: Changes the position in the event stream where the next event that is read will come from by specifying a starting position and an offset from the starting position. No events logged before the starting position plus the offset will be retrieved.

member.summary: 藉由指定開始位置和從開始位置起算的位移，變更事件資料流中所讀取之下一個事件的來源位置。 在開始位置加上位移之前所記錄的事件不會遭擷取。

param.name: origin
param.vsli:raw: A value from the <see cref="T:System.IO.SeekOrigin" /> enumeration defines where in the stream of events to start querying for events.

member.param: 列舉型別的值會定義事件資料流中開始查詢事件的位置。

param.name: offset
param.vsli:raw: The offset number of events to add to the origin.

member.param: 要與原點相加的事件位移數目。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader.BatchSize

summary.vsli:raw: Gets or sets the number of events retrieved from the stream of events on every read operation.

member.summary: 取得或設定每個讀取作業從事件資料流中擷取的事件數目。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns an integer value.

member.returns: 傳回整數值。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader.LogStatus

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the status of each event log or log file associated with the event query in this object.

member.summary: 取得這個物件中，與事件查詢相關聯之每個事件記錄或記錄檔的狀態。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a list of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogStatus" /> objects that each contain status information about an event log associated with the event query in this object.

member.returns: 傳回 物件的清單，每個物件都包含這個物件中，與事件查詢相關聯之事件記錄檔的狀態資訊。

summary.vsli:raw: Represents an exception that is thrown when an error occurred while reading, querying, or subscribing to the events in an event log.

member.summary: 表示在讀取、查詢或訂閱事件記錄檔相關資訊時，若發生錯誤所擲回的例外狀況。

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> class.

member.param: 物件，其中包含來源或目的地的相關內容資訊。

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> class by specifying the error message that describes the current exception.

member.param: 描述目前例外狀況的錯誤訊息。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord

summary.vsli:raw: Contains the properties of an event instance for an event that is received from an <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader" /> object. The event properties provide information about the event such as the name of the computer where the event was logged and the time that the event was created.

member.summary: 包含 (從 物件接收的) 事件之事件執行個體的屬性。 事件屬性可提供事件相關資訊，例如記錄事件所在的電腦名稱，以及事件的建立時間。

summary.vsli:raw: Releases the unmanaged resources used by this object, and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.summary: 釋放這個物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

param.name: disposing
param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.

member.param: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the event message in the current locale.

member.summary: 取得目前地區設定的事件訊息。

member.returns: 傳回包含目前地區設定中事件訊息的字串。

member.param: 選取要傳回的屬性值。

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含事件的 XML 表示。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the globally unique identifier (GUID) for the activity in process for which the event is involved. This allows consumers to group related activities.

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a GUID value.

member.returns: 傳回 GUID 值。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a placeholder (bookmark) that corresponds to this event. This can be used as a placeholder in a stream of events.

member.summary: 取得對應至這個事件的預留位置 (書籤)。 它可以當做事件之資料流中的預留位置使用。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark" /> object.

member.returns: 傳回 物件。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the name of the event log or the event log file in which the event is stored.

member.summary: 取得事件記錄的名稱，或儲存事件的事件記錄檔名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the name of the event log or the event log file in which the event is stored.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含事件記錄的名稱，或儲存事件的事件記錄檔名稱。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the identifier for this event. All events with this identifier value represent the same type of event.

member.summary: 取得這個事件的識別項。 所有具有這個識別項值的事件都表示相同的事件型別。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns an integer value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回整數值。 這個值可以是 Null。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the keyword mask of the event. Get the value of the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord.KeywordsDisplayNames" /> property to get the name of the keywords used in this mask.

member.summary: 取得事件的關鍵字遮罩。 取得 屬性的值，以取得這個遮罩中所使用之關鍵字的名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a long value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回長數值。 這個值可以是 Null。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the display names of the keywords used in the keyword mask for this event.

member.summary: 取得此事件的關鍵字遮罩中所使用之關鍵字的顯示名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns an enumerable collection of strings that contain the display names of the keywords used in the keyword mask for this event.

member.returns: 傳回字串的可列舉集合，包含此事件的關鍵字遮罩中所使用之關鍵字的顯示名稱。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the level of the event. The level signifies the severity of the event. For the name of the level, get the value of the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord.LevelDisplayName" /> property.

member.returns: 傳回位元組值。 這個值可以是 Null。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the display name of the level for this event.

member.summary: 取得這個事件等級的顯示名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the display name of the level for this event.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含這個事件等級的顯示名稱。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the name of the event log where this event is logged.

member.summary: 取得記錄這個事件的事件記錄檔名稱。

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含記錄這個事件的事件記錄檔名稱。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the name of the computer on which this event was logged.

member.summary: 取得記錄這個事件的電腦名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the name of the computer on which this event was logged.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含記錄這個事件所在的電腦名稱。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord.MatchedQueryIds

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a list of query identifiers that this event matches. This event matches a query if the query would return this event.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord.Opcode

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the opcode of the event. The opcode defines a numeric value that identifies the activity or a point within an activity that the application was performing when it raised the event. For the name of the opcode, get the value of the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord.OpcodeDisplayName" /> property.

member.summary: 取得事件的 opcode。 這個 opcode 會定義數值，這個數值會定義活動 (當應用程式引發事件時，會執行這個活動) 或活動中的某一點。 如需 opcode 名稱，請取得 屬性的值。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a short value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回短數值。 這個值可以是 Null。

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the display name of the opcode for this event.

member.summary: 取得這個事件之 opcode 的顯示名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the display name of the opcode for this event.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含這個事件之 opcode 的顯示名稱。

member.returns: 傳回整數值。 這個值可以是 Null。

member.summary: 取得發行這個事件之事件提供者的全域唯一識別項 (GUID)。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogType

summary.vsli:raw: Defines the type of events that are logged in an event log. Each log can only contain one type of event.

member.summary: 定義事件記錄檔中所記錄的事件型別。 每個記錄檔只能包含一種事件型別。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogType.Administrative

summary.vsli:raw: These events are primarily for end users, administrators, and support. The events that are found in the Administrative type logs indicate a problem and a well-defined solution that an administrator can act on. An example of an administrative event is an event that occurs when an application fails to connect to a printer.

member.summary: 這些事件主要適用於使用者、系統管理員和支援人員。 系統管理型別記錄檔中的事件表示問題，以及系統管理員可以執行的妥善定義方案。 舉例而言，當應用程式無法連接到印表機時所發生的事件，就是系統管理事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogType.Analytical

summary.vsli:raw: Events in an analytic event log are published in high volume. They describe program operation and indicate problems that cannot be handled by user intervention.

member.summary: 分析事件記錄檔中的事件會大量發行。 它們會描述程式作業，並指出使用者操作所無法處理的問題。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogType.Debug

summary.vsli:raw: Events in a debug type event log are used solely by developers to diagnose a problem for debugging.

member.summary: 偵錯型別事件記錄檔中的事件只能由開發人員用來診斷問題以進行偵錯。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogType.Operational

summary.vsli:raw: Events in an operational type event log are used for analyzing and diagnosing a problem or occurrence. They can be used to trigger tools or tasks based on the problem or occurrence. An example of an operational event is an event that occurs when a printer is added or removed from a system.

member.summary: 作業型別事件記錄檔中的事件是用來分析及診斷問題或發生的情況。 根據問題或發生的情況，它們可以用來觸發工具或工作。 舉例而言，在系統中新增或移除印表機時所發生的事件，就是作業事件。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher

summary.vsli:raw: Allows you to subscribe to incoming events. Each time a desired event is published to an event log, the <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten" /> event is raised, and the method that handles this event will be executed.

member.summary: 讓您訂閱內送事件。 每次所需的事件發行至事件記錄檔時，就會引發 事件，並會執行處理這個事件的方法。

member.name: E:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten

summary.vsli:raw: Allows setting a delegate (event handler method) that gets called every time an event is published that matches the criteria specified in the event query for this object.

member.summary: 允許設定委派 (事件處理常式方法)，每次發行符合這個物件之事件查詢中所指定準則的事件時，都會呼叫這個委派。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher" /> class by specifying an event query.

member.summary: 藉由指定事件查詢，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

param.name: eventQuery
param.vsli:raw: Specifies a query for the event subscription. When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten" /> event is raised.

member.param: 指定事件訂閱的查詢。 當所記錄之事件符合查詢中表示的準則時，就會引發 事件。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery,System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher" /> class by specifying an event query and a bookmark that is used as starting position for the query.

member.summary: 藉由指定事件查詢以及做為查詢開始位置的書籤，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

param.name: eventQuery
param.vsli:raw: Specifies a query for the event subscription. When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten" /> event is raised.

member.param: 指定事件訂閱的查詢。 當所記錄之事件符合查詢中表示的準則時，就會引發 事件。

param.name: bookmark
param.vsli:raw: The bookmark (placeholder) used as a starting position in the event log or stream of events. Only events that have been logged after the bookmark event will be returned by the query.

member.param: 當做事件記錄檔或事件資料流中開始位置來使用的書籤 (預留位置)。 查詢只會傳回在書籤事件之後所記錄的事件。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery,System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark,System.Boolean)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher" /> class by specifying an event query, a bookmark that is used as starting position for the query, and a Boolean value that determines whether to read the events that already exist in the event log.

member.summary: 藉由指定事件查詢、做為查詢開始位置的書籤，以及判斷是否要讀取事件記錄檔中現有事件的布林值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

param.name: eventQuery
param.vsli:raw: Specifies a query for the event subscription. When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten" /> event is raised.

member.param: 指定事件訂閱的查詢。 當所記錄之事件符合查詢中表示的準則時，就會引發 事件。

param.name: bookmark
param.vsli:raw: The bookmark (placeholder) used as a starting position in the event log or stream of events. Only events that have been logged after the bookmark event will be returned by the query.

member.param: 當做事件記錄檔或事件資料流中開始位置來使用的書籤 (預留位置)。 查詢只會傳回在書籤事件之後所記錄的事件。

param.name: readExistingEvents
param.vsli:raw: A Boolean value that determines whether to read the events that already exist in the event log. If this value is <see langword="true" />, then the existing events are read and if this value is <see langword="false" />, then the existing events are not read.

member.param: 布林值，用於判斷是否要讀取事件記錄檔中的現有事件。 如果這個值是 ，就會讀取現有事件，如果這個值是 ，就不會讀取現有事件。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.#ctor(System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher" /> class by specifying the name or path to an event log.

member.summary: 藉由指定事件記錄檔的名稱或路徑，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

param.name: path
param.vsli:raw: The path or name of the event log monitor for events. If any event is logged in this event log, then the <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten" /> event is raised.

member.param: 事件之事件記錄檔監控程式的名稱或路徑。 如果在這個事件記錄檔中記錄任何事件，就會引發 事件。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.Dispose

summary.vsli:raw: Releases all the resources used by this object.

member.summary: 釋放這個物件所使用的所有資源。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.Dispose(System.Boolean)

summary.vsli:raw: Releases the unmanaged resources used by this object, and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.summary: 釋放這個物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

param.name: disposing
param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.

member.param: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.Enabled

summary.vsli:raw: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this object starts delivering events to the event delegate.

member.summary: 取得或設定值，指出這個物件是否會開始傳遞事件至事件委派。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> when this object can deliver events to the event delegate; <see langword="false" /> when this object has stopped delivery.

member.returns: 當這個物件可以將事件傳遞給事件委派時， 當這個物件已停止傳遞時。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata

summary.vsli:raw: Contains the metadata (properties and settings) for an event that is defined in an event provider.

member.summary: 包含事件提供者中所定義事件的中繼資料 (屬性和設定)。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.Description

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the description template associated with the event using the current thread locale for the description language.

member.summary: 使用描述語言目前的執行緒地區設定，取得與事件相關聯的描述範本。

returns.vsli:raw: A string that contains the description template associated with the event.

member.returns: 包含與事件相關聯之描述範本的字串。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.Id

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the identifier of the event that is defined in the event provider.

member.summary: 取得事件提供者中已定義事件的識別項。

returns.vsli:raw: The event identifier.

member.returns: 事件識別項。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.Keywords

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the keywords associated with the event that is defined in the event provider.

member.summary: 取得與事件提供者中定義的事件相關聯的關鍵字。

returns.vsli:raw: An enumerable collection of the keywords associated with the event.

member.returns: 與事件相關聯之關鍵字的可列舉集合。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.Level

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the level associated with the event that is defined in the event provider. The level defines the severity of the event.

member.summary: 取得與事件提供者中已定義事件相關聯的等級。 這個等級會定義事件的嚴重性。

returns.vsli:raw: The level associated with the event.

member.returns: 與事件相關聯的層級。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.LogLink

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a link to the event log that receives this event when the provider publishes this event.

member.summary: 取得事件記錄檔的連結，當提供者發行這個事件時，這個事件記錄檔會接收這個事件。

returns.vsli:raw: A link to the event log.

member.returns: 事件記錄檔的連結。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.Opcode

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the opcode associated with this event that is defined by an event provider. The opcode defines a numeric value that identifies the activity or a point within an activity that the application was performing when it raised the event.

member.summary: 取得與這個事件 (由事件提供者定義) 相關聯的 opcode。 這個 opcode 會定義數值，這個數值會定義活動 (當應用程式引發事件時，會執行這個活動) 或活動中的某一點。

returns.vsli:raw: The opcode associated with this event.

member.returns: 與這個事件相關聯的操作碼。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.Task

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the task associated with the event. A task identifies a portion of an application or a component that publishes an event.

member.summary: 取得與事件相關聯的工作。 工作會識別發行事件之應用程式或元件的一部分。

returns.vsli:raw: The task associated with the event.

member.returns: 與事件相關聯的工作。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.Template

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the template string for the event. Templates are used to describe data that is used by a provider when an event is published. Templates optionally specify XML that provides the structure of an event. The XML allows values that the event publisher provides to be inserted during the rendering of an event.

member.summary: 取得事件的範本字串。 範本用來描述提供者在發行事件時所使用的資料。 範本可以選擇性地指定提供事件結構的 XML。 XML 允許呈現事件期間，插入事件發行者所提供的值。

returns.vsli:raw: A string that contains the template for the event.

member.returns: 包含事件範本的字串。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.Version

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the version of the event that qualifies the event identifier.

member.summary: 取得限定事件識別項的事件版本。

returns.vsli:raw: A byte value that contains the version of the event.

member.returns: 包含事件版本的位元組值。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventOpcode

summary.vsli:raw: Contains an event opcode that is defined in an event provider. An opcode defines a numeric value that identifies the activity or a point within an activity that the application was performing when it raised the event.

member.summary: 包含事件提供者中所定義的事件 opcode。 opcode 會定義數值，這個值會識別當應用程式引發事件時，正在執行的活動或活動中的某一點。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventOpcode.DisplayName

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the localized name for an event opcode.

member.summary: 取得事件 opcode 的當地語系化名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: The localized name for an event opcode.

member.returns: 事件 opcode 的當地語系化名稱。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventOpcode.Name

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the non-localized name for an event opcode.

member.summary: 取得事件 opcode 的非當地語系化名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: The non-localized name for an event opcode.

member.returns: 事件 opcode 的非當地語系化名稱。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventOpcode.Value

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the numeric value associated with the event opcode.

member.summary: 取得與事件 opcode 相關聯的數值。

returns.vsli:raw: The numeric value associated with the event opcode.

member.returns: 與事件操作碼相關聯的數值。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventProperty

summary.vsli:raw: Contains the value of an event property that is specified by the event provider when the event is published.

member.summary: 包含發行事件時，事件提供者所指定事件屬性的值。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventProperty.Value

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the value of the event property that is specified by the event provider when the event is published.

member.summary: 取得事件屬性的值，這個事件屬性是在發行事件時，由事件提供者所指定。

returns.vsli:raw: The value of the event property.

member.returns: 事件屬性的值。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord

summary.vsli:raw: Defines the properties of an event instance for an event that is received from an <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReader" /> object. The event properties provide information about the event such as the name of the computer where the event was logged and the time the event was created. This class is an abstract class. The <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord" /> class implements this class.

member.summary: 定義 (從 物件接收的) 事件之事件執行個體的屬性。 事件屬性可提供事件相關資訊，例如記錄事件所在的電腦名稱，以及事件的建立時間。 這個類別是抽象類別。 類別會實作這個類別。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.#ctor

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord" /> class.

member.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.Dispose

summary.vsli:raw: Releases all the resources used by this object.

member.summary: 釋放這個物件所使用的所有資源。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.Dispose(System.Boolean)

summary.vsli:raw: Releases the unmanaged resources used by this object, and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.summary: 釋放這個物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

param.name: disposing
param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.

member.param: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.FormatDescription

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the event message in the current locale.

member.summary: 取得目前地區設定的事件訊息。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the event message in the current locale.

member.returns: 傳回包含目前地區設定中事件訊息的字串。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.FormatDescription(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Object})

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the event message, replacing variables in the message with the specified values.

member.summary: 取得事件訊息，並將訊息中的變數取代為指定的值。

param.name: values
param.vsli:raw: The values used to replace variables in the event message. Variables are represented by %n, where n is a number.

member.param: 值，用來取代事件訊息中的變數。 變數由 %n 表示，其中 n 為數字。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the event message in the current locale.

member.returns: 傳回包含目前地區設定中事件訊息的字串。

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.ToXml

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the XML representation of the event. All of the event properties are represented in the event XML. The XML conforms to the event schema.

member.summary: 取得事件的 XML 表示。 所有事件屬性都是以事件的 XML 來表示。 XML 符合事件結構描述。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the XML representation of the event.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含事件的 XML 表示。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.ActivityId

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the globally unique identifier (GUID) for the activity in process for which the event is involved. This allows consumers to group related activities.

member.summary: 取得含有事件之執行中活動的全域唯一識別項 (GUID)。 這可以讓消費者將相關的活動分組。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a GUID value.

member.returns: 傳回 GUID 值。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.Bookmark

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a placeholder (bookmark) that corresponds to this event. This can be used as a placeholder in a stream of events.

member.summary: 取得對應至這個事件的預留位置 (書籤)。 它可以當做事件之資料流中的預留位置使用。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark" /> object.

member.returns: 傳回 物件。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.Id

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the identifier for this event. All events with this identifier value represent the same type of event.

member.summary: 取得這個事件的識別項。 所有具有這個識別項值的事件都表示相同的事件型別。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns an integer value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回整數值。 這個值可以是 Null。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.Keywords

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the keyword mask of the event. Get the value of the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.KeywordsDisplayNames" /> property to get the name of the keywords used in this mask.

member.summary: 取得事件的關鍵字遮罩。 取得 屬性的值，以取得這個遮罩中所使用之關鍵字的名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a long value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回長數值。 這個值可以是 Null。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.KeywordsDisplayNames

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the display names of the keywords used in the keyword mask for this event.

member.summary: 取得此事件的關鍵字遮罩中所使用之關鍵字的顯示名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns an enumerable collection of strings that contain the display names of the keywords used in the keyword mask for this event.

member.returns: 傳回字串的可列舉集合，包含此事件的關鍵字遮罩中所使用之關鍵字的顯示名稱。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.Level

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the level of the event. The level signifies the severity of the event. For the name of the level, get the value of the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.LevelDisplayName" /> property.

member.summary: 取得事件的等級。 這個等級表示事件的嚴重性。 如需等級名稱，請取得 屬性的值。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a byte value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回位元組值。 這個值可以是 Null。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.LevelDisplayName

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the display name of the level for this event.

member.summary: 取得這個事件等級的顯示名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the display name of the level for this event.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含這個事件等級的顯示名稱。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.LogName

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the name of the event log where this event is logged.

member.summary: 取得記錄這個事件的事件記錄檔名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains a name of the event log that contains this event.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含記錄這個事件的事件記錄檔名稱。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.MachineName

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the name of the computer on which this event was logged.

member.summary: 取得記錄這個事件的電腦名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the name of the computer on which this event was logged.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含記錄這個事件所在的電腦名稱。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.Opcode

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the opcode of the event. The opcode defines a numeric value that identifies the activity or a point within an activity that the application was performing when it raised the event. For the name of the opcode, get the value of the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.OpcodeDisplayName" /> property.

member.summary: 取得事件的 opcode。 這個 opcode 會定義數值，這個數值會定義活動 (當應用程式引發事件時，會執行這個活動) 或活動中的某一點。 如需 opcode 名稱，請取得 屬性的值。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a short value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回短數值。 這個值可以是 Null。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.OpcodeDisplayName

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the display name of the opcode for this event.

member.summary: 取得這個事件之 opcode 的顯示名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the display name of the opcode for this event.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含這個事件之 opcode 的顯示名稱。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.ProcessId

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the process identifier for the event provider that logged this event.

member.summary: 取得記錄這個事件之事件提供者的處理序識別項。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns an integer value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回整數值。 這個值可以是 Null。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.Properties

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the user-supplied properties of the event.

member.summary: 取得事件的使用者提供屬性。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a list of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventProperty" /> objects.

member.returns: 傳回 物件的清單。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.ProviderId

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the globally unique identifier (GUID) of the event provider that published this event.

member.summary: 取得發行這個事件之事件提供者的全域唯一識別項 (GUID)。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a GUID value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回 GUID 值。 這個值可以是 Null。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.ProviderName

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the name of the event provider that published this event.

member.summary: 取得發行這個事件之事件提供者的名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a string that contains the name of the event provider that published this event.

member.returns: 傳回字串，這個字串包含發行這個事件的事件提供者名稱。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.Qualifiers

summary.vsli:raw: Gets qualifier numbers that are used for event identification.

member.summary: 取得用於事件識別的限定詞編號。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns an integer value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回整數值。 這個值可以是 Null。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.RecordId

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the event record identifier of the event in the log.

member.summary: 取得記錄檔中事件的事件記錄識別項。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a long value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回長數值。 這個值可以是 Null。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.RelatedActivityId

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a globally unique identifier (GUID) for a related activity in a process for which an event is involved.

member.summary: 取得含有事件之執行中相關活動的全域唯一識別項 (GUID)。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns a GUID value. This value can be null.

member.returns: 傳回 GUID 值。 這個值可以是 Null。

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.Task

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a task identifier for a portion of an application or a component that publishes an event. A task is a 16-bit value with 16 top values reserved. This type allows any value between 0x0000 and 0xffef to be used. To obtain the task name, get the value of the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord.TaskDisplayName" /> property.

member.summary: 取得發行事件之應用程式或元件一部分的工作識別項。 工作是已保留 16 個臨界數值的 16 位元值。 這個型別允許介於使用 0x0000 和 0xffef 之間的任何值。 若要取得 (Obtain) 工作名稱，請取得 (Get) 屬性的值。

returns.vsli:raw: Returns an integer value. This value can be null.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.SessionAuthentication

summary.vsli:raw: Defines values for the type of authentication used during a Remote Procedure Call (RPC) login to a server. This login occurs when you create a <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogSession" /> object that specifies a connection to a remote computer.

member.summary: 定義遠端程序呼叫 (RPC) 登入伺服器期間所使用驗證類型的值。 當您建立指定遠端電腦連線的 物件時，會發生此登入動作。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.SessionAuthentication.Default

summary.vsli:raw: Use the default authentication method during RPC login. The default authentication is equivalent to Negotiate.

member.summary: RPC 登入期間使用預設驗證方法。 預設驗證相當於 Negotiate。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.SessionAuthentication.Kerberos

summary.vsli:raw: Use Kerberos authentication during RPC login.

member.summary: RPC 登入期間使用 Kerberos 驗證。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.SessionAuthentication.Negotiate

summary.vsli:raw: Use the Negotiate authentication method during RPC login. This allows the client application to select the most appropriate authentication method (NTLM or Kerberos) for the situation.

member.summary: RPC 登入期間使用 Negotiate 驗證方法。 這可讓用戶端應用程式視狀況選取最適當的驗證方法 (NTLM 或 Kerberos)。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.SessionAuthentication.Ntlm

summary.vsli:raw: Use Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) authentication during RPC login.

member.summary: RPC 期間使用 Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) 驗證。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventKeywords.AuditFailure

summary.vsli:raw: Attached to all failed security audit events. This keyword should only be used for events in the Security log.

member.summary: 已附加至所有失敗的安全性稽核事件。 這個關鍵字只應用於安全性記錄檔中的事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventKeywords.AuditSuccess

summary.vsli:raw: Attached to all successful security audit events. This keyword should only be used for events in the Security log.

member.summary: 已附加至所有成功的安全性稽核事件。 這個關鍵字只應用於安全性記錄檔中的事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventKeywords.CorrelationHint

summary.vsli:raw: Attached to transfer events where the related Activity ID (Correlation ID) is a computed value and is not guaranteed to be unique (not a real GUID).

member.summary: 已附加至傳輸事件，其中相關活動 ID (相互關聯 ID) 是經過計算的值，而且不保證是唯一 (不是真正的 GUID) 的值。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventKeywords.CorrelationHint2

summary.vsli:raw: Attached to transfer events where the related Activity ID (Correlation ID) is a computed value and is not guaranteed to be unique (not a real GUID).

member.summary: 已附加至傳輸事件，其中相關活動 ID (相互關聯 ID) 是經過計算的值，而且不保證是唯一 (不是真正的 GUID) 的值。

summary.vsli:raw: Attached to events which are raised using the RaiseEvent function.

member.summary: 已附加至使用 RaiseEvent 函式所引發的事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventKeywords.ResponseTime

summary.vsli:raw: Attached to all response time events.

member.summary: 附加至所有回應時間事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventKeywords.Sqm

summary.vsli:raw: Attached to all Service Quality Mechanism (SQM) events.

member.summary: 已附加至所有服務品質機制 (SQM) 事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventKeywords.WdiContext

summary.vsli:raw: Attached to all Windows Diagnostic Infrastructure (WDI) context events.

member.summary: 附加至所有 Windows 診斷基礎結構 (WDI) 內容事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventKeywords.WdiDiagnostic

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventLevel

summary.vsli:raw: Defines the standard event levels that are used in the Event Log service. The level defines the severity of the event. Custom event levels can be defined beyond these standard levels. For more information about levels, see <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLevel" />.

member.summary: 定義事件記錄服務中所使用的標準事件等級。 這個等級會定義事件的嚴重性。 除了標準等級之外，您也可以定義自訂事件等級。 如需事件等級的詳細資訊，請參閱 。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventLevel.Critical

summary.vsli:raw: This level corresponds to critical errors, which is a serious error that has caused a major failure.

member.summary: 這個等級會對應至嚴重錯誤，也就是造成重大失敗的嚴重錯誤。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventLevel.Error

summary.vsli:raw: This level corresponds to normal errors that signify a problem.

member.summary: 這個等級會對應至表示問題的一般錯誤。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventLevel.Informational

summary.vsli:raw: This level corresponds to informational events or messages that are not errors. These events can help trace the progress or state of an application.

member.summary: 這個等級會對應至非錯誤的告知性事件或訊息。 這些事件有助於追蹤應用程式的進度或狀態。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventLevel.LogAlways

summary.vsli:raw: This value indicates that not filtering on the level is done during the event publishing.

member.summary: 這個值表示發行事件時未執行等級篩選。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventLevel.Verbose

summary.vsli:raw: This level corresponds to lengthy events or messages.

member.summary: 這個等級會對應至冗長的事件或訊息。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventLevel.Warning

summary.vsli:raw: This level corresponds to warning events. For example, an event that gets published because a disk is nearing full capacity is a warning event.

member.summary: 這個等級會對應至警告事件。 例如，磁碟接容量快不夠時，所發行的事件就是警告事件。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventOpcode

summary.vsli:raw: Defines the standard opcodes that are attached to events by the event provider. For more information about opcodes, see <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventOpcode" />.

member.summary: 定義由事件提供者附加至事件的標準 opcode。 如需 opcode 的詳細資訊，請參閱 。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventOpcode.DataCollectionStart

summary.vsli:raw: An event with this opcode is a trace collection start event.

member.summary: 具有這個 opcode 的事件是追蹤集合開始事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventOpcode.DataCollectionStop

summary.vsli:raw: An event with this opcode is a trace collection stop event.

member.summary: 具有這個 opcode 的事件是追蹤集合停止事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventOpcode.Extension

summary.vsli:raw: An event with this opcode is an extension event.

member.summary: 具有這個 opcode 的事件是擴充事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventOpcode.Info

summary.vsli:raw: An event with this opcode is an informational event.

member.summary: 具有這個 opcode 的事件是告知性事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventOpcode.Resume

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventOpcode.Start

summary.vsli:raw: An event with this opcode is published when an application starts a new transaction or activity. This can be embedded into another transaction or activity when multiple events with the Start opcode follow each other without an event with a Stop opcode.

member.summary: 在應用程式啟動新交易或活動時，便會發行具有這個 opcode 的事件。 當多個具有 Start opcode 的事件相互跟隨，但是沒有具有 Stop opcode 的事件時，可以將它內嵌在另一個交易或活動中。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventOpcode.Stop

summary.vsli:raw: An event with this opcode is published when an activity or a transaction in an application ends. The event corresponds to the last unpaired event with a Start opcode.

member.summary: 在應用程式中的活動或交易結束時，便會發行具有這個 opcode 的事件。 此事件會對應至具有 Start opcode 的最後一個未成對事件。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventOpcode.Suspend

summary.vsli:raw: An event with this opcode is published when an activity in an application is suspended.

member.summary: 在應用程式中的活動暫停時，便會發行具有這個 opcode 的事件。

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction

summary.vsli:raw: Specifies how to handle entries in an event log that has reached its maximum file size.

member.summary: 代表事件記錄檔累積到最大檔案容量時，應如何處理記錄檔內的資料。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.DoNotOverwrite

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates that existing entries are retained when the event log is full and new entries are discarded.

member.summary: 當事件記錄檔容量已達上限時，保留原有項目，將新的項目丟棄。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteAsNeeded

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates that each new entry overwrites the oldest entry when the event log is full.

member.summary: 當事件記錄檔容量已達上限時，用最新的項目覆寫最舊的項目。

member.name: F:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction.OverwriteOlder

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates that new events overwrite events older than specified by the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays" /> property value when the event log is full. New events are discarded if the event log is full and there are no events older than specified by the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays" /> property value.

member.summary: 當事件記錄檔容量已達上限時，舊的項目只要存放期間超過 屬性值所設定的天數，就會被新的項目覆寫。 當事件記錄檔滿載時，如果沒有任何事件的存放期間超過 屬性值指定的天數，便將新的事件丟棄。
